item.title: Trump to hit India with 25% tariffs - plus 'penalty' for trade with Russia
item.description: The US president said the measures would take effect from from 1 August, the US deadline for a trade deal.

item.title: Hawaiians cram roads away from coasts as tsunami waves arrive
item.description: Following early warnings to evacuate coastal areas, thousands of Hawaiians head for higher ground - for many it isn't the first time.

item.title: Russian missile hits Ukrainian training unit, killing and wounding servicemen
item.description: Ukraine's military says three people were killed as Russia posted video of what it said was the strike.

item.title: India and US launch 'first-of-its-kind' satellite
item.description: Nasa-Isro joint mission Nisar will record the minutest of changes in the land, sea or ice sheets.

item.title: What we know as tsunami alerts issued after Russia earthquake
item.description: The 8.8 magnitude earthquake is believed to be one of the most powerful ever recorded.
